name: WorstTank - Browser Edition (WebGL)
description:
Hi everyone!

This Edition Of The Game is a Browser Build of Our Game

The game is simple, kill your character to proceed to next level :D

Other Editions Of The Game:

Original Version - https://pacchu.itch.io/worsttank

3D EDITION -  https://portable-nuke.itch.io/worst-tank-3d-edition

Controls:

A, D  or Arrow Keys for Rotation

Left click for shooting

Escape for pause 

R for restart

Thank you for checking out our game! :)))

WorstTank By Pacchu and Paz
